text: NGC 186 is a lenticular galaxy located 3.4 million light-years away in the constellation Pisces. This galaxy is more slimmer than the other galaxies, and the stars have rays that can be detected with a satellite. It was discovered by William Herschel in 1891. ==References== ==External links== * 0186 Category:Lenticular galaxies Category:Pisces (constellation)
title: NGC 186
